text: Musalamanera kaja naya ye, musalamanake hatya kare; kintu bhulakrame. Ye byakti musalamanake bhulakrame hatya kare, se ekajana musalamana kritadasa mukta karabe ebam rakta binimaya samarpana karabe tara sbajanaderake; kintu yadi tara ksama kare deya. Atahpara yadi nihata byakti tomadera satru sampradayera antargata haya, tabe musalamana kritadasa mukta karabe ebam yadi se tomadera sathe cuktibad'dha kona sampradayera antargata haya, tabe rakta binimaya samarpana karabe tara sbajanaderake ebam ekajana musalamana kritadasa mukta karabe. Atahpara ye byakti na paya, se allahara kacha theke gonaha mapha karanora jan'ye uparyupuri du'i masa roya rakhabe. Allaha, mahajnani, prajnamaya.
